question: Adam had 48 books. If he sold 19 of them and used the money he earned to buy 38 new books, how many books would Adam have?
response:
Adam had 48 books initially. He sold 19 books, so he now has 48 - 19 = <<48-19=29>>29 books.
He used the money he earned from selling the books to buy 38 new books. So, he now has 29 + 38 = <<29+38=67>>67 books.
The answer is 67.
